text: When death draws near, the warrior's desperation unleashes devastating power at great cost!
Abandoning all defense, the warrior charges forth with unstoppable momentum!
Swift as thunder, the warrior becomes an unstoppable force that sends foes flying!
Raw aggression overwhelms technique, trading accuracy for devastating crushing power!
Explosive fire erupts from within, consuming all enemies in its scorching embrace!
The warrior's resolve becomes unbreakable, turning enemy strikes back upon themselves!
When death draws near, the warrior's desperation unleashes devastating power at great cost!
The seasoned veteran's fighting prowess reaches its peak, striking with deadly precision!
The general's presence on the battlefield inspires courage and swift movement in his warriors!
